title: The Helping hand
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Visatone (Australia)
brief_description: Three new-Australians tell of the moment when they felt accepted in Australia and how they have worked to fit in with the local way of living. English lessons at Cooma are shown and finally a naturalization ceremony in a Sydney suburb.
description: Three new-Australians tell of the moment when they felt accepted in Australia and how they have worked to fit in with the local way of living. English lessons at Cooma are shown and finally a naturalization ceremony in a Sydney suburb.
